about_the_game: Take your parade to the end of the universe. Samba Space Parade is an action puzzle game full of cute characters and quirky music. Recruit new players, upgrade members, and earn money as you tour the galaxy, aiming for the highest scores and entertaining the cutest alien audiences.
detailed_description: Take your parade to the end of the universe. Samba Space Parade is an action puzzle game full of cute characters and quirky music. Recruit new players, upgrade members, and earn money as you tour the galaxy, aiming for the highest scores and entertaining the cutest alien audiences.
name: Samba Space Parade Demo
short_description: Take a look at this crazy upcoming game about carnaval.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
